title: Free Hextech Loot?
body:
Just a quick question on how the hextech loot works... This is an alt account, made only to play Elise. I instantly purchased Elise and Death Blossom Elise, and started the climb.

After hitting level 5, however, I opened my free hextech box, and received Blood Moon Elise.

Is the free vox guaranteed to give a skin for a champ you own? I know the regular ones don't, so am I just lucky? Is this the Elise prophecy???

replies.body:
Yes the promotional chests always contain a skin for a champ you own, thats why you hold those chests on alt accounts until have the champ you want a skin for, then open it.

There is the lv 3 chest with garen and ashe, then the promotional chest which gives a taste, and in order to have a taste you need to get a skin you can redeem.
